product_name: Brooks Sherpa IV Shorts - Men's 5" Inseam
long_description: Reliably comfortable, the men's Brooks Sherpa IV Shorts are built with a 5-in. inseam for light coverage and smart pockets for storage on long runs. Moisture-wicking shell fabric features plenty of stretch. Soft liner moves moisture away from skin. Water-resistant center-back clamshell pocket with zipper. Dual rear holster pockets. Front and rear reflectivity. Brooks Sherpa IV Shorts are semifitted.
short_description: Reliably comfortable, the men's Brooks Sherpa IV Shorts are built with a 5-in. inseam for light coverage and smart pockets for storage on long runs.
